content: --अंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} living at the western borders. (--तः {1} the western border or extremity, the extreme end or term; the western shore. {2} (<ab>pl.</ab>) the country or inhabitants of the western-borders near the Sahya mountain; अपरांतजयोद्यतैः ( अनीकैः) <ls>R. 4. 53</ls> western people. {3} the kings of this country. {4} death,
